author: hgomez
msg: Add support for Gzip compression (reply AND/OR request)

author: jochen
msg: The test suite is running on a random port now. It used to use port 8080, which caused problems, if the port was reused too fast, or if that port was blocked by another server.

author: aevers
msg: Fix general resource leaks regarding connections in client side
transpot code. There is now an endClientRequest() in the
XmlRpcTransport interface. Appropriate implementations have been
filled in for all shipped transports.
Passes all tests except Base64 (was already broken). Note, for
tests to pass you must have commons-logging installed as

author: aevers
msg: The createWorker() method should call getHandlerMapping() to allow
XmlRpcServer users to override the handler mapping.
